arts.ttl: “What Has Nigeria Achieved In African Football? - Ben Ahenda Slams NPFL After Sudan’s 4-0 CHAN Rout
arts.oTtl: NPFL News, Latest News | Nigeria | Footballnews.net
arts.sum: The fallout from Sudan’s stunning 4–0 victory over Nigeria at CHAN PAMOJA 2024 has triggered a wave of criticism, none sharper than that from Ben Ahenda, veteran sports journalist with Standard Group–Kenya, who has covered international football for over 40 years. Speaking to Sports247 in Zanzibar after the match, Ahenda delivered a frank assessment of Nigeria’s football system:
